entries.meaning: (genetics) Of or relating to the genes of different species.
(rare) Relating to or involving (people, animals, things, etc, of) different kinds (genera), for example different sexes..
examples: There is no question that the mail survey is "the most practical method for obtaining reasonably compatible data across a large geographic base, a large  heterogenic group, and also a large sample size".

entries.meaning: Characteristic of a different sex (especially of hypertrichosis or facial hair typical of a man but found on a woman).
